name: Transmuting Time
description:
(Recommended that you play in fullscreen) 

How To Play
  • Use AD or the arrows to move
  • Use W or Space to jump
  • Collect powerups to speed up the game
  • Get to the end of the level before the timer runs out
Game Jam

This game was created for A Jam About Time..  The theme used for this game was "Time never waits for us" and "What if time can be manipulated...".

Assets Used
  • Font - https://www.dafont.com/bd-cartoon-shout.font
  • Menu Music - “8 Bit Arcade” - Classic Upbeat Chiptune By HeatleyBros
  • Game Music - "New Challenger!" Exciting Adventure Game Music by HeatleyBros
